data.message: WOW, that was a wonderful year in review for the world to see. Thank you Facebook for keeping us in touch with our families around the world.

replies.message: You're very welcome, Debra. We're glad you enjoyed the Year in Review video. Thanks for stopping by! -Jessica

My id hacked
Can you help me?
A great thanks to Facebook . W/ out it , contacting someone via phone calls are really expensive . Thanks for your amazing technology . Indeed a great help .
When I  was younger, we would call & write letter to our family and friends. I would send pictures with a letter! I is nice that you can see everything  sooner with Facebook!
Gracias Facebook por tan bonito vídeo me encantó.
Me encantó mi video gracias facebook

Abdurahman Bek go to the hacked page and there is a place to click on to report this issue. I am sorry I am unable to tell you exactly where but I have done it for my mom and a friend and Facebook took care of it quickly

I love Facebook....I live alone but have a large and interesting family . I stay in contact with every one of them through Facebook. I enjoy the videos of our own activities which pop up unexpectedly and delight us with posts we may have forgotten or, better yet, love to remember. Thank you FB!
It's our pleasure, Nancy. We're glad you are able to stay connected to family through Facebook. -Joe
Fb is great. Able to connect people all over d world
I loved the video.It had so much meaning
We're happy you loved the Year in Review video, Wendy! Thanks for stopping by. -Jessica
Thank you facebook that was nice

Thanks facebook for the great Year 
in Review.
Facebook made millions peddling fake news and Russian propaganda and helped elect a Russian agent.
